about_the_game:
Recolor is a complete and immersive experience, with a deep narrative told through art, music, and gameplay itself.

The little chameleon Leo has lost the ability to perceive colors. He sought refuge in a dark cave, alone, where he could hide from the dangers of the grim and predatory nature.

By overcoming his fears and facing challenges, Leo regains a bit of hope to explore nature and follow his instincts.

Every regained connection with a color grants the chameleon a new ability to overcome obstacles and face his deepest fears.

Recolor is an experience of self-discovery, resilience, and melancholy.

What would a chameleon be without its colors?

Loneliness is neither a punishment nor a refuge.


Game Features

  • A touching 2D platformer with puzzles and elements of action and adventure.

  • During gameplay, you will acquire versatile abilities, such as a tongue that helps you move around or drag objects.

  • Exciting cinematics with hand-refined animations.

  • Face your predators and unravel the lonely journey of the chameleon through stunning landscapes in each region, divided into five chapters filled with adventures, challenges, and emotions.

  • Explore a completely new and immersive world where each color grants you a new ability, while also coloring the scenery and adding instruments to the soundtrack.

short_description: The chameleon has lost the ability to perceive colors. By facing his obstacles, he can once again connect with the colorful world. Each color unlocks a new ability, helping him overcome challenges. Leo's emotional state is portrayed through the environment, colors, and music.
